scripts.bad: node scripts/generate.js bad > fixtures/current-output.jsonl && cat fixtures/current-output.jsonl
scripts.good: node scripts/generate.js good > fixtures/current-output.jsonl && cat fixtures/current-output.jsonl
scripts.check: node -e "require('fs').accessSync(require('path').join(__dirname,'..','..','packages','cli','dist','index.js'))" && node ../../packages/cli/dist/index.js eval -c .promptproof/rules.yml || npx -y promptproof-cli eval -c .promptproof/rules.yml
